variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build-core
dependent_to.description:
scikit-build-core is a doubly improved build system generator for
CPython C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It features several
improvements over the classic scikit-build build system generator.

dependent_to.name: py-numpy
dependent_to.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-theme-builder
dependent_to.description: A tool for authoring Sphinx themes with a simple (opinionated) workflow.
